00001 #include "pio.h"
00002 #include <common.h>
00003 #include "ide.h"
00004 
00005 //Returns 1 if fail
00006 //Returns 0 if success
00007 uint8 pio_28bit_wait_busy_drq(pio_device device, uint32 timeout)
00008 {
00009         uint8 timeout_timer = timeout;
00010 
00011         for (;;)
00012         {
00013                 if (timeout_timer < 1)
00014                 {
00015                         return 1; //Fail
00016                 }
00017 
00018                 uint8 rb = inb(device.BAR1 + CTRL_PORT);
00019                 if ((rb & 0x80) == 0)
00020                 {
00021                         //BSY Not set
00022                         if ((rb & 0x8) == 0x8)
00023                         {
00024                                 //DRQ Set
00025                                 break;
00026                         }
00027                 }
00028         }
00029 
00030         return 0;
00031 }
00032 
00033 //PIO 28bit read
00034 //Returns 1 if success
00035 //Returns 0 if fail
00036 uint8 pio_28bit_read(pio_device device, uint16* destination, uint32 lba, uint8 numberOfSectors)
00037 {
00038 
00039         outb(device.BAR0 + REG_DEVSEL, 0xE0 | (device.disk << 4) | ((lba >> 24) & 0x0F));  //Select the device (Slave or master) and send the last 4 bits of the LBA
00040         outb(device.BAR0 + 1, 0); //Null the register
00041         outb(device.BAR0 + 2, numberOfSectors); //Set the numberOfSectors
00042         outb(device.BAR0 + 3, (uint8) lba); //First 8 bits of the lba
00043         outb(device.BAR0 + 4, (uint8) (lba >> 8)); //Bits 8-16 of the LBA
00044         outb(device.BAR0 + 5, (uint8) (lba >> 16)); //Bits 16-24 of the LBA
00045         outb(device.BAR0 + 7, 0x20); //Send the read sectors command
00046 
00047         unsigned int toRead = numberOfSectors;
00048         if (numberOfSectors == 0)
00049         {
00050                 toRead = 256;
00051         }
00052 
00053         for (;;)
00054         {
00055                 if (toRead < 1)
00056                 {
00057                         break;
00058                 }
00059 
00060                 inb(device.BAR0); //Wait 400ns
00061                 inb(device.BAR0);
00062                 inb(device.BAR0);
00063                 inb(device.BAR0);
00064 
00065                 if (pio_28bit_wait_busy_drq(device, RESET_TIMEOUT) == 1)
00066                 {
00067                         printf("ERROR: DISK READ ERROR WAIT TIMEOUT\n");
00068                         return 0;
00069                 }
00070 
00071                 unsigned int i = 0;
00072                 for (i = 0; i < 256; i++) {             
00073                         *destination = inw(device.BAR0);
00074                         destination++;
00075                 }
00076 
00077                 toRead--;
00078         }
00079 
00080         return 1;
00081 }
